events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The application has been categorised under the engineering cluster as the candidate has software development experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidateâ€™s hiring process and communications.
The candidate completed the initial screening call successfully, demonstrating strong knowledge in software development principles.
Candidate responded promptly to our follow-up email expressing enthusiasm for the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next Tuesday at 2 PM UTC to assess coding and system design skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showcasing excellent problem-solving and coding abilities.
Following the technical round, the HR interview is scheduled for this Friday to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
The HR interview was completed with positive feedback regarding the candidate's communication and team collaboration skills.
An offer letter has been proposed to the candidate including a competitive salary package and benefits tailored to senior engineers.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer terms and confirmed their excitement to join the engineering team.
Offer acceptance received; candidate officially agreed to join as a software engineer starting next month.
Onboarding processes have commenced with provision of necessary resources and access to the engineering development environment.
The engineering recruitment case has been successfully closed with the candidate onboarded and all administrative tasks completed.
